thread.title: Scarlett Moffatt confirms Gogglebox exit as she joins Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway | London Evening Standard
thread.title_full: Scarlett Moffatt confirms Gogglebox exit as she joins Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway | London Evening Standard

author: Ben Travis
title: Scarlett Moffatt confirms Gogglebox exit as she joins Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway | London Evening Standard
text:
Luxury Follow us: 
We use cookies to enhance your visit to our site and to bring you advertisements that might interest you. Read our Privacy and Cookie Policies to find out more. TV Scarlett Moffatt confirms family’s Gogglebox exit as she joins Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway 
The I’m A Celeb winner’s career is taking off – so she’s leaving the Channel 4 show Tuesday 21 February 2017 10:02 GMT Click to follow Axed: Scarlett Moffatt's family won't be appearing on Gogglebox in the new series Anthony Harvey/Getty 
Scarlett Moffatt has confirmed that her family will no longer be featured on Gogglebox . 
The reality star, who won last year’s series of I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out of Here has revealed that she won’t appear on the Channel 4 show in future – and neither will her family. 
She posted the news on Instagram alongside a photo of her with her parents on the red carpet. 
“We are going to miss doing #gogglebox so so much but can’t wait to watch the new series,” she wrote. “(Good luck my fellow goggleboxers you will smash it love the Moffatts).” Gogglebox: The families
